title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.9 - Educator Comment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.9 - Educator Comment

State Regulations
LEAs shall ensure there is a process in place for each
teacher and principal who is reviewed in accordance with this section to
provide written comment on their performance review in addition to any
collectively bargained grievance or appeal procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.9

Adopted

New

York State Register March 26, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 12, eff. 3/26/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. LEAs shall ensure there is a process in place for each teacher and principal who is reviewed in accordance with this section to provide written comment on their performance review in addition to any collectively bargained grievance or appeal procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.9

Adopted

New York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 2/3/2025, exp. 4/3/2025
(Emergency)
